channel.title: CVE Feed for Chain Sea Information Integration Co., Ltd -- ai chatbot system
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Chain Sea Information Integration Co., Ltd -- ai chatbot system

item.title: CVE-2021-44162|2024-08-04T04:17:24.265Z -- chain%20sea%20information%20integration%20co.%2C%20ltd -- ai%20chatbot%20system
item.description: Chain Sea ai chatbot system’s specific file download function has path traversal vulnerability. The function has improper filtering of special characters in URL parameters, which allows a remote attacker to download arbitrary system files without authentication.

item.title: CVE-2021-44164|2024-08-04T04:17:24.570Z -- chain%20sea%20information%20integration%20co.%2C%20ltd -- ai%20chatbot%20system
item.description: Chain Sea ai chatbot system’s file upload function has insufficient filtering for special characters in URLs, which allows a remote attacker to by-pass file type validation, upload malicious script and execute arbitrary code without authentication, in order to take control of the system or terminate service.

item.title: CVE-2021-44163|2024-08-04T04:17:24.582Z -- chain%20sea%20information%20integration%20co.%2C%20ltd -- ai%20chatbot%20system
item.description: Chain Sea ai chatbot backend has improper filtering of special characters in URL parameters, which allows a remote attacker to perform JavaScript injection for XSS (reflected Cross-site scripting) attack without authentication.
